metadata.businessValue: Uptime and Availability of Meeting Spaces is keyto support the Hybrid Work culture and make sure remote participants can alwaysjoin and be a equal participant in the meeting.

descriptionParagraphs.name: Short description
content: Lean approach to manage and monitor Teams Room devices.

descriptionParagraphs.name: Business need or problem
content: The responsibility to keep the Meeting Spaces running is a close collaboration between Facilities and IT. Lots of organization struggle with this demarcation and how to address issues efficiently.

descriptionParagraphs.name: Business solution
content: Communicativ will manage and monitor the meetingspace equipment to make sure all devices and accessories are running the latestsoftware and Teams Room accounts are registered and working correctly.

descriptionParagraphs.name: Success factors
content: By making sure the equipment is always availablefor, the Meeting Space solutions are rapidly adopted by the End Users.

detailItemCategories.name: Resources
detailItemCategories.description: Possible html supported text shown just above the list of links
